parameters.command: =PATH="/home/node/.local/bin:$PATH" yt-dlp --no-playlist -f "bestvideo[ext=mp4]+bestaudio[ext=m4a]/best[ext=mp4]/best" --merge-output-format mp4 --no-part -o "/home/node/downloads/{{ $('Merge YouTube Metadata').item.json.id }}.mp4" "{{ $('Merge YouTube Metadata').item.json.video_url }}" 2>&1 || PATH="/home/node/.local/bin:$PATH" yt-dlp --no-playlist -f "best[ext=mp4]/best" --merge-output-format mp4 --no-part -o "/home/node/downloads/{{ $('Merge YouTube Metadata').item.json.id }}.mp4" "{{ $('Merge YouTube Metadata').item.json.video_url }}" 2>&1

=export PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:/data/src

VIDEO_ID="{{ $('Merge YouTube Metadata').first().json.id }}"
FILE_NAME="{{ $('Read Video File').first().binary.data.fileName }}"
DETECT_OUTPUT="{{ $('Detect Logo (YOLO)').item.json.stdout }}"
NEW_LOGO_URL="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.new_logo_url || '' }}"
INTRO_VIDEO_URL="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.intro_background_url || '' }}"

# Visual Effects (Anti-AI)
FLIP="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.flip ? '--flip' : '' }}"
ZOOM="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.zoom || 1.1 }}"
SPEED="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.speed || 1.02 }}"
BRIGHTNESS="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.brightness || 0.05 }}"
SATURATION="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.saturation || 1.1 }}"
HUE="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.hue || 0.0 }}"

BG_MUSIC="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.background_music_url || '' }}"
REMOVE_TEXT="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.remove_text ? '--remove_text' : '' }}"
FILTER_NSFW="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.filter_nsfw ? '--filter_nsfw' : '' }}"
OCR_LANGUAGES="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.ocr_languages || 'en' }}"
OCR_EXPAND="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.ocr_expand || 10 }}"
OCR_MAX_FRAMES="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.ocr_max_frames || 3 }}"
GEMINI_KEY="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.gemini_api_key || '' }}"

# Logo Configs
LOGO_WIDTH="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.logo_width || 220 }}"
LOGO_HEIGHT="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.logo_height || '' }}"
LOGO_PADDING="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.logo_padding || 10 }}"
LOGO_POSITION="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.logo_position || 'top-right' }}"

# Split Configs
SPLIT_MODE="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.split_mode || 'none' }}"
SPLIT_START="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.split_start || '00:00:00' }}"
SPLIT_DURATION="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.split_duration || 10 }}"
SPLIT_MIN_DURATION="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.split_min_duration || 5 }}"
SPLIT_LIMIT="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.split_limit || 5 }}"

# Signature/Watermark Configs (Anti-Copyright)
UNIQUE_MODE="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.unique_mode ? '--unique' : '' }}"
WATERMARK_TEXT="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.watermark_text || '' }}"
WATERMARK_OPACITY="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.watermark_opacity || 0.3 }}"
WATERMARK_SIZE="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.watermark_size || 24 }}"
WATERMARK_POSITION="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.watermark_position || 'bottom' }}"

# Advanced Configs
FFMPEG_PRESET="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.ffmpeg_preset || 'veryfast' }}"
DELOGO_EXPAND="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.delogo_expand || 0 }}"
BG_MUSIC_VOLUME="{{ $('Get Video Information').first().json.bg_music_volume || 0.3 }}"

LOGO_HEIGHT_ARG=""
if [ -n "$LOGO_HEIGHT" ]; then
  LOGO_HEIGHT_ARG="--logo_height $LOGO_HEIGHT"
fi

GEMINI_ARG=""
if [ -n "$GEMINI_KEY" ]; then
  GEMINI_ARG="--gemini_key $GEMINI_KEY"
fi

WATERMARK_ARG=""
if [ -n "$WATERMARK_TEXT" ]; then
  WATERMARK_ARG="--watermark $WATERMARK_TEXT --watermark-opacity $WATERMARK_OPACITY --watermark-size $WATERMARK_SIZE --watermark-position $WATERMARK_POSITION"
fi

OUTPUT_FILE="/home/node/downloads/${VIDEO_ID}_processed.mp4"
VIDEO_INPUT="/home/node/downloads/${FILE_NAME}"
LOGO_INPUT="/home/node/downloads/logo_${VIDEO_ID}.png"
OUTPUT_DIR="/home/node/downloads"

# Download Music if provided
MUSIC_ARG=""
if [ -n "$BG_MUSIC" ]; then
  MUSIC_FILE="/home/node/downloads/music_${VIDEO_ID}.mp3"
  wget -O "$MUSIC_FILE" "$BG_MUSIC"
  MUSIC_ARG="--background_music $MUSIC_FILE"
fi

python3 /data/src/controller/video_controller.py pipeline \
  "$VIDEO_INPUT" \
  "$LOGO_INPUT" \
  "$DETECT_OUTPUT" \
  "$OUTPUT_FILE" \
  --new_logo_url "$NEW_LOGO_URL" \
  --intro_url "$INTRO_VIDEO_URL" \
  --work_dir "$OUTPUT_DIR" \
  $FLIP \
  --zoom "$ZOOM" \
  --speed "$SPEED" \
  --brightness "$BRIGHTNESS" \
  --saturation "$SATURATION" \
  --hue "$HUE" \
  $REMOVE_TEXT \
  $FILTER_NSFW \
  --ocr_languages "$OCR_LANGUAGES" \
  --ocr_expand "$OCR_EXPAND" \
  --ocr_max_frames "$OCR_MAX_FRAMES" \
  $GEMINI_ARG \
  --logo_width "$LOGO_WIDTH" \
  $LOGO_HEIGHT_ARG \
  --logo_padding "$LOGO_PADDING" \
  --logo_position "$LOGO_POSITION" \
  --ffmpeg_preset "$FFMPEG_PRESET" \
  --delogo_expand "$DELOGO_EXPAND" \
  --bg_music_volume "$BG_MUSIC_VOLUME" \
  --split-mode "$SPLIT_MODE" \
  --split-start "$SPLIT_START" \
  --split-duration "$SPLIT_DURATION" \
  --split-min-duration "$SPLIT_MIN_DURATION" \
  --split-limit "$SPLIT_LIMIT" \
  $UNIQUE_MODE \
  $WATERMARK_ARG \
  $MUSIC_ARG 2>&1

=#!/bin/bash
set -e

VIDEO_ID="{{ $('Merge YouTube Metadata').first().json.id }}"
DRIVE_UUID="{{ $('Merge YouTube Metadata').first().json.driveUuid }}"
SOURCE_FILE="/home/node/downloads/${VIDEO_ID}_processed.mp4"
DEST_PATH="gdrive:reup-ytb/${DRIVE_UUID}.mp4"

if [ ! -f "$SOURCE_FILE" ]; then
  echo "ERROR: Source file not found: $SOURCE_FILE" >&2
  exit 1
fi

rclone copyto "$SOURCE_FILE" "$DEST_PATH" -P >/dev/null 2>&1

nodes.name: Get Video Info For YouTube Check

parameters.command:
=VIDEO_ID="{{ $json.id }}"
LINK="{{ $json.processed_video_drive_link }}"

[ -z "$LINK" ] && exit 0

FILE_ID=$(echo "$LINK" | sed -n 's/.*\/d\/\([^\/]*\)\/.*/\1/p')
[ -z "$FILE_ID" ] && FILE_ID=$(echo "$LINK" | sed -n 's/.*[?&]id=\([^&]*\).*/\1/p')
[ -z "$FILE_ID" ] && echo "$LINK" | grep -qE '^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$' && FILE_ID="$LINK"
[ -z "$FILE_ID" ] && exit 0

URL="https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=${FILE_ID}"

header=$(wget --server-response --spider -q "$URL" 2>&1)
name=$(echo "$header" | sed -n 's/.*filename="\([^"]*\)".*/\1/p')

[ -z "$name" ] && name="${VIDEO_ID}.mp4"

mkdir -p /home/node/downloads

OUTPUT="/home/node/downloads/$name"

wget -q "$URL" -O "$OUTPUT"

[ ! -s "$OUTPUT" ] && exit 0

echo "$OUTPUT"

parameters.title: ={{ (() => { const getParsedTitle = () => { const parseMeta = $('Parse Video Metadata'); if (!parseMeta || !parseMeta.isExecuted) return null; const metaItem = parseMeta.first(); if (!metaItem || !metaItem.json || !metaItem.json.youtube_title) return null; const title = String(metaItem.json.youtube_title).trim(); return title ? title : null; }; const parsedTitle = getParsedTitle(); if (parsedTitle) return parsedTitle; const sheetData = $('Get Video Information').first().json; if (sheetData.youtube_title) return sheetData.youtube_title; if (sheetData.video_title) return sheetData.video_title; return null; })() }}
parameters.categoryId: ={{ (() => { const CATEGORY_MAP = { 'other': 24, 'ho·∫°t h√¨nh': 1, '√¢m nh·∫°c': 10, 't√¢m s·ª±': 24, 'music': 10, 'animation': 1, 'entertainment': 24 }; const cat = $('Get Video Information').first().json.youtube_category; if (!cat) return null; const catLower = String(cat).toLowerCase().trim(); return CATEGORY_MAP[catLower] || null; })() }}

options.description: ={{ (() => { const getParsedDescription = () => { const parseMeta = $('Parse Video Metadata'); if (!parseMeta || !parseMeta.isExecuted) return null; const metaItem = parseMeta.first(); if (!metaItem || !metaItem.json || !metaItem.json.youtube_description) return null; const desc = String(metaItem.json.youtube_description).trim(); return desc ? desc : null; }; const parsedDesc = getParsedDescription(); if (parsedDesc) return parsedDesc; return $('Get Video Information').first().json.youtube_description || null; })() }}

value.youtube_link: ={{ (() => { const extractVideoId = (uploadItem) => { if (!uploadItem || !uploadItem.json) return null; const json = uploadItem.json; if (Array.isArray(json) && json.length > 0) return json[0].uploadId; if (typeof json === 'object' && json !== null) return json.uploadId; return null; }; const uploadResult = $('Upload To YouTube'); if (!uploadResult || !uploadResult.isExecuted) return ''; const uploadItem = uploadResult.first(); const videoId = extractVideoId(uploadItem); if (!videoId) return ''; const trimmedId = String(videoId).trim(); return trimmedId ? `https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=${trimmedId}` : ''; })() }}
value.youtube_upload_time: ={{ (() => { const now = new Date(); const dateStr = now.toLocaleDateString('vi-VN', { timeZone: 'Asia/Ho_Chi_Minh', year: 'numeric', month: '2-digit', day: '2-digit' }); const timeStr = now.toLocaleTimeString('vi-VN', { timeZone: 'Asia/Ho_Chi_Minh', hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit', second: '2-digit' }); return `${dateStr} ${timeStr}`; })() }}
value.processed_video_drive_link: ={{ (() => { const getDriveLink = $('Get Drive Link'); if (getDriveLink && getDriveLink.isExecuted) { const result = getDriveLink.first(); if (result && result.json && result.json.stdout) { return String(result.json.stdout).trim(); } } return $('Get Video Information').first().json.processed_video_drive_link; })() }}
value.youtube_title: ={{ (() => { const getParsedTitle = () => { const parseMeta = $('Parse Video Metadata'); if (!parseMeta || !parseMeta.isExecuted) return null; const metaItem = parseMeta.first(); if (!metaItem || !metaItem.json || !metaItem.json.youtube_title) return null; const title = String(metaItem.json.youtube_title).trim(); return title ? title : null; }; const parsedTitle = getParsedTitle(); if (parsedTitle) return parsedTitle; const sheetData = $('Get Video Information').first().json; if (sheetData.youtube_title) return sheetData.youtube_title; if (sheetData.video_title) return sheetData.video_title; return null; })() }}
value.youtube_description: ={{ (() => { const getParsedDescription = () => { const parseMeta = $('Parse Video Metadata'); if (!parseMeta || !parseMeta.isExecuted) return null; const metaItem = parseMeta.first(); if (!metaItem || !metaItem.json || !metaItem.json.youtube_description) return null; const desc = String(metaItem.json.youtube_description).trim(); return desc ? desc : null; }; const parsedDesc = getParsedDescription(); if (parsedDesc) return parsedDesc; return $('Get Video Information').first().json.youtube_description || null; })() }}

values.content:
=B·∫°n l√† chuy√™n gia t·ªëi ∆∞u h√≥a metadata YouTube. Nhi·ªám v·ª• c·ªßa b·∫°n l√† t·∫°o ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ v√† m√¥ t·∫£ YouTube m·ªõi d·ª±a tr√™n video_title ƒë·∫ßu v√†o.

D·ªÆ LI·ªÜU ƒê·∫¶U V√ÄO:
video_title: ={{ $json.video_title }}

========================================

- ƒê·ªô d√†i: CH√çNH X√ÅC 60-100 k√Ω t·ª± (t√≠nh to√†n b·ªô k√Ω t·ª±, bao g·ªìm kho·∫£ng tr·∫Øng)
- Ti√™u ƒë·ªÅ ph·∫£i h·∫•p d·∫´n, thu h√∫t click v√† t·ªëi ∆∞u SEO
- Ph·∫£i ch·ª©a t·ª´ kh√≥a ch√≠nh li√™n quan ƒë·∫øn video_title ƒë·∫ßu v√†o
- D√πng Title Case ho·∫∑c Sentence Case (m·ªôt ki·ªÉu duy nh·∫•t)
- KH√îNG ƒë∆∞·ª£c d√πng emoji ho·∫∑c k√Ω t·ª± ƒë·∫∑c bi·ªát (ngo·∫°i tr·ª´ d·∫•u ch·∫•m, ph·∫©y, d·∫•u g·∫°ch)
- Kh√¥ng ƒë∆∞·ª£c th·ª´a kho·∫£ng tr·∫Øng ·ªü ƒë·∫ßu ho·∫∑c cu·ªëi

========================================
Y√äU C·∫¶U B·∫ÆT BU·ªòC CHO M√î T·∫¢ (youtube_description)
========================================
- ƒê·ªô d√†i: 200-5000 k√Ω t·ª± (t·ªëi thi·ªÉu 200, t·ªëi ∆∞u 500-2000)
- 2-3 d√≤ng ƒë·∫ßu ph·∫£i ch·ª©a t·ª´ kh√≥a ch√≠nh c·ªßa video_title v√† thu h√∫t ng∆∞·ªùi xem
- N·ªôi dung ph·∫£i li√™n quan ch·∫∑t ch·∫Ω t·ªõi video, m√¥ t·∫£ r√µ r√†ng gi√° tr·ªã video
- C√≥ th·ªÉ th√™m l·ªùi k√™u g·ªçi h√†nh ƒë·ªông (Subscribe, Like)
- C√≥ th·ªÉ th√™m timestamp, link, ho·∫∑c hashtag (3-10 hashtag) n·∫øu ph√π h·ª£p
- S·ª≠ d·ª•ng k√Ω t·ª± \n ƒë·ªÉ xu·ªëng d√≤ng (kh√¥ng xu·ªëng d√≤ng th·∫≠t)
- Kh√¥ng ƒë∆∞·ª£c th·ª´a kho·∫£ng tr·∫Øng ·ªü ƒë·∫ßu ho·∫∑c cu·ªëi

========================================
Y√äU C·∫¶U V·ªÄ ƒê·ªäNH D·∫†NG OUTPUT (C·ª∞C K·ª≤ QUAN TR·ªåNG - S·∫º ƒê∆Ø·ª¢C PARSE B·∫∞NG JSON.parse())
========================================
B·∫°n PH·∫¢I tr·∫£ v·ªÅ DUY NH·∫§T m·ªôt JSON object h·ª£p l·ªá c√≥ ƒë√∫ng 2 tr∆∞·ªùng:

{"youtube_title":"...","youtube_description":"..."}

QUY ƒê·ªäNH NGHI√äM NG·∫∂T:
- KH√îNG ƒë∆∞·ª£c d√πng markdown code blocks (```json, ```)
- KH√îNG c√≥ vƒÉn b·∫£n gi·∫£i th√≠ch b√™n ngo√†i JSON
- KH√îNG c√≥ comment trong JSON (//, /* */)
- KH√îNG c√≥ trailing comma
- KH√îNG ƒë∆∞·ª£c tr·∫£ v·ªÅ array ([{...}])
- KH√îNG ƒë∆∞·ª£c th√™m b·∫•t k·ª≥ tr∆∞·ªùng n√†o kh√°c
- T·∫•t c·∫£ gi√° tr·ªã ph·∫£i l√† string, d√πng d·∫•u nh√°y k√©p "
- Escape special characters ƒë√∫ng c√°ch: \" cho quotes, \\ cho backslash, \n cho newline
- JSON ph·∫£i h·ª£p l·ªá v√† parse ƒë∆∞·ª£c b·∫±ng JSON.parse()
- Field names PH·∫¢I ch√≠nh x√°c: "youtube_title" v√† "youtube_description" (lowercase, underscore)

V√ç D·ª§ FORMAT ƒê√öNG:
{"youtube_title":"This Is An Example YouTube Title That Is Between 60 And 100 Characters Long","youtube_description":"This is an example description that must be at least 200 characters long to meet the requirements. It should include relevant keywords and be engaging for viewers. You can add more content here to reach the minimum character count. This description should provide value and encourage viewers to watch the video."}

========================================
ƒêI·ªÄU KI·ªÜN B·∫ÆT BU·ªòC PH·∫¢I ƒê·∫†T
========================================
- youtube_title: 60-100 k√Ω t·ª± (inclusive), non-empty string
- youtube_description: 200-5000 k√Ω t·ª± (inclusive), non-empty string
- C·∫£ hai field ƒë·ªÅu b·∫Øt bu·ªôc, kh√¥ng ƒë∆∞·ª£c null ho·∫∑c undefined
- KH√îNG ƒë∆∞·ª£c d√πng emoji
- Response ph·∫£i parse ƒë∆∞·ª£c b·∫±ng JSON.parse() kh√¥ng l·ªói

========================================
H√ÉY TI·∫æN H√ÄNH T·∫†O TI√äU ƒê·ªÄ V√Ä M√î T·∫¢ NGAY B√ÇY GI·ªú.
CH·ªà TR·∫¢ V·ªÄ ƒê√öNG JSON OBJECT, KH√îNG TH√äM B·∫§T K·ª≤ TH·ª® G√å KH√ÅC.
KH√îNG C√ì MARKDOWN, KH√îNG C√ì GI·∫¢I TH√çCH, CH·ªà C√ì JSON OBJECT THU·∫¶N T√öY.

parameters.command:
=THUMB_URL="{{ $json.thumbnail_url }}"
VIDEO_ID="{{ $json.id }}"
OUTPUT="/home/node/downloads/thumb_${VIDEO_ID}.jpg"

[ -z "$THUMB_URL" ] && exit 0

# Extract Google Drive file ID if it's a drive link
FILE_ID=$(echo "$THUMB_URL" | sed -n 's/.*\/d\/\([^\/]*\)\/.*/\1/p')
[ -z "$FILE_ID" ] && FILE_ID=$(echo "$THUMB_URL" | sed -n 's/.*[?&]id=\([^&]*\).*/\1/p')

if [ -n "$FILE_ID" ]; then
  URL="https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=${FILE_ID}"
else
  URL="$THUMB_URL"
fi

wget -q "$URL" -O "$OUTPUT" 2>&1

[ -s "$OUTPUT" ] && echo "$OUTPUT" || echo ""

main.node: Get Video Info For YouTube Check
